# canBecomeMain

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the window can become the application’s main window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canBecomeMain: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the window can become the main window; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

Attempts to make the window the main window are abandoned if the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. The value of the property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the window is visible, is not an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPanel] object, and has a title bar or a resize mechanism. Otherwise, the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Managing Main Status

- **isMainWindow**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window is the application’s main window.
- **makeMain()**: Makes the window the main window.
- **becomeMain()**: Informs the window that it has become the main window.
- **resignMain()**: Resigns the window’s main window status.
